public void commitST()
select the nextTree as the current/old tree. This should be called when the ReflRouted decides that the commands should be sent

Overrides:
commitST in class MST

STisBetter

public boolean STisBetter()
decides wether nextTree is better than oldTree, taking into account the momentum factor

Overrides:
STisBetter in class MST
Returns:
true if cost of next tree is better than MOM_FACT * old tree

computeST

public void computeST()
Invoked by ReflRouter when MDST must be recomputed. It computes two vectors of tunnels (commands) that must be activated (toActivate) and deactivated (toDeactivate) in order to convert the current tree to the minimum spanning tree. A selected tunnel consist of link from A to B and from B to A i.e. both must be selected and the selection is made taking into account both links' quality.

Overrides:
computeST in class MST
